MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​InteropRegistrationPolicy
public static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​InteropRegistrationPolicy

Collection of the standard policies to handle UserData type registrations.  Provided mostly for compile-time backward compatibility with old code.  See also : IRegistrationPolicy .

Properties
Default
public static IRegistrationPolicy Default { get }

The default registration policy used by MoonSharp unless explicitely replaced.  Deregistrations are allowed, but registration of a new descriptor are not allowed if a descriptor is already registered for that type.  Types must be explicitly registered.

Explicit
[Obsolete("Please use InteropRegistrationPolicy.Default instead.")]
public static IRegistrationPolicy Explicit { get }

The default registration policy used by MoonSharp unless explicitely replaced.  Deregistrations are allowed, but registration of a new descriptor are not allowed if a descriptor is already registered for that type.  Types must be explicitly registered.

Automatic
public static IRegistrationPolicy Automatic { get }

Types are automatically registered if not found in the registry. This is easier to use but potentially unsafe.
